message: Let's be fair, 50/50 split, no inflation to worry about!
Considering inflation, this is more than fair!
Inflation is a factor, but I still think a closer split is better. Let's meet in the middle!
Inflation is hitting you hard, I'm being generous!
This is my final offer. We both lose money with each passing round. Let's end this before it gets worse for both of us!
You're losing value fast, take it while you can!
